snippet.title: HAXITY - Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Boot up your Cyberdeck and get ready to jack in on June 17th when Haxity hits Steam Early Access!

Wishlist Today at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/979800/Haxity/

To join the beta, enter our Discord at this link: https://discord.gg/P4aTmj8

Haxity is a cyberpunk, roguelite, action deck-builder developed and published by Megapop. Draft your deck, modify your fighter and outsmart your opponent. Fight online, challenge your friends or terminate the AI. Slot, hack and execute. Welcome to Haxity!

Follow on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Haxity/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayHaxity

Join the Community:
Discord: https://discord.gg/7CshZ7B
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Haxity/
